bonus.value: Increases flame ATK after casting weapon skill by 8%/10%/12%/15% for 25 seconds. If multiple star rating effects are triggered, the one triggered last prevails. This effect does not stack.

Grant Mastery after casting weapon skill for 15 seconds, with a cooldown of 15 seconds (Mastery shares cooldowns across levels). Mastery is not stackable. Increases flame damage by 2%/2.5%/3%/3.5% every time the target is hit with a normal attack until the end of Mastery, adding a maximum of 1 stack every 0.2 seconds, up to 6 stacks. After 6 stacks, gain a shield that can block damage 1 time.

mind.name: 背影之后
mind.desc: 细嫩的幼芽总是被精心庇护着，但也会想从背影后走到前方与她并肩，踮起脚并肩。

memory.name: 模糊水汽
memory.desc: 像蒸腾的水蒸气般朦胧看不真切，所谓过去之事是否也只是梦中的幻景呢？

belief.name: 如影随形
belief.desc: 虽然总是要一路小跑才能跟得上，但如果真的掉队了，她会在不远处等着你的。

emotion.name: 多莉与火花
emotion.desc: 蕾贝的朋友，蕾贝最好的朋友。
